name: react-components
description: Display the semanticallty mapped assets for the user to add to the CAT or EUI

scripts.prehot: node -e 'if(/^v(2|3|4)/.test(process.version)===false){console.log("node engine error, looking for iojs v2+ or node v4+");process.exit(1);}'
scripts.prebuild: node -e 'if(/^v(2|3|4)/.test(process.version)===false){console.log("node engine error, looking for iojs v2+ or node v4+");process.exit(1);}'
scripts.predeploy: node -e 'if(/^v(2|3|4)/.test(process.version)===false){console.log("node engine error, looking for iojs v2+ or node v4+");process.exit(1);}'
scripts.deploy: webpack --colors --profile --progress && echo bundle.js ... deployed && mv bundle.js ../Sandbox/support/client/lib/vwf/view/SAVE/bundle.js

author: John Pywtorak
